attributes.action: Stop persecution of 'trekkies', recognise their right to exist, entitle each 'trekkie' to a 50% discount on all online dating services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop persecution of 'trekkies', recognise their right to exist, entitle each 'trekkie' to a 50% discount on all online dating services. We feel the persecution suffered by 'trekkies' nationwide is unfair and unjust, we feel that we should be able to walk down the street in our costumes without fear of mockery from the public. We also urge the government to introduce klingon as an optional second language in UK schools.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
